title: The Best American Comics 2011
description: “If you have spent a long time resisting the status quo—whether it’s in art, society, or the political world—what happens when that status quo at last gives way?A universe of possibility opens up.”—Alison Bechdel, from the IntroductionFeaturing: Gabrielle Bell, Joe Sacco, Dash Shaw, Sabrina Jones, Chris Ware, Jillian Tamaki, Jaime Hernandez, Jeff Smith, Paul Pope, Kevin Huizenga, and others
author: Alison Bechdel
